name: Classic Snake (itch) (Ta1kur1)
description:
This is just a remake of the old game classic Snake. I have been on a long break from game developing and just needed to make a small project so i could get my touch back again. There is no other special feature in this game other than the three speed options. The "High" speed can be quite challenging especially with the touch controls. So yeah you can play this with a phone. ;)

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD, Arrow keys and arrows on screen
  • Start game: Space
